content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed on was 500 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [I will answer only the question I am asked] The conversation did not cover my level of satisfaction with the outcome.
name: Haoyu Wang
